00020 /**
00021  * @defgroup ApnsPHP_Push Push
00022  * @ingroup ApplePushNotificationService
00023  */
00024 
00025 /**
00026  * The Push Notification Provider.
00027  *
00028  * The class manages a message queue and sends notifications payload to Apple Push
00029  * Notification Service.
00030  *
00031  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Push
00032  */
00033 class ApnsPHP_Push extends ApnsPHP_Abstract
00034 {
00035     const COMMAND_PUSH = 0; /**< @type integer Payload command. */
00036 
00037     protected $_nSendRetryTimes = 3; /**< @type integer Send retry times. */
00038 
00039     protected $_aServiceURLs = array(
00040         'ssl://gateway.push.apple.com:2195', // Production environment
00041         'ssl://gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com:2195' // Sandbox environment
00042     ); /**< @type string Service URLs environments. */
00043 
00044     protected $_aMessageQueue = array(); /**< @type array Message queue. */
00045 
00046     /**
00047      * Set the send retry times value.
00048      *
00049      * If the client is unable to send a payload to to the server retries at least
00050      * for this value. The default send retry times is 3.
00051      *
00052      * @param  $nRetryTimes @type integer Send retry times.
00053      */
00054     public function setSendRetryTimes($nRetryTimes)
00055     {
00056         $this->_nSendRetryTimes = (int)$nRetryTimes;
00057     }
00058 
00059     /**
00060      * Get the send retry time value.
00061      *
00062      * @return @type integer Send retry times.
00063      */
00064     public function getSendRetryTimes()
00065     {
00066         return $this->_nSendRetryTimes;
00067     }
00068 
00069     /**
00070      * Adds a message to the message queue.
00071      *
00072      * @param  $message @type ApnsPHP_Message The message.
00073      */
00074     public function add(ApnsPHP_Message $message)
00075     {
00076         $sMessagePayload = $message->getPayload();
00077         $nRecipients = $message->getRecipientsNumber();
00078 
00079         for ($i = 0; $i < $nRecipients; $i++) {
00080             $this->_aMessageQueue[] = array(
00081                 'MESSAGE' => $message,
00082                 'BINARY_NOTIFICATION' => $this->_getBinaryNotification(
00083                     $message->getRecipient($i),
00084                     $sMessagePayload
00085                 ),
00086                 'RETRY_TIMES' => 0
00087             );
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     /**
00092      * Sends all messages in the message queue to Apple Push Notification Service.
00093      *
00094      * @throws ApnsPHP_Push_Exception if not connected to the
00095      *         service or no notification queued.
00096      */
00097     public function send()
00098     {
00099         if (!$this->_hSocket) {
00100             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00101                 'Not connected to Push Notification Service'
00102             );
00103         }
00104 
00105         if (empty($this->_aMessageQueue)) {
00106             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00107                 'No notifications queued to be sent'
00108             );
00109         }
00110 
00111         foreach($this->_aMessageQueue as $k => &$aMessage) {
00112             $bSuccessfulSent = false;
00113             while ($bSuccessfulSent == false && $aMessage['RETRY_TIMES'] <= $this->_nSendRetryTimes) {
00114                 if (function_exists('pcntl_signal_dispatch')) {
00115                     pcntl_signal_dispatch();
00116                 }
00117                 if ($aMessage['RETRY_TIMES'] > 0) {
00118                     $this->_log(
00119                         'INFO: Retrying to send message ' . ($k+1) . " (" .
00120                         "{$aMessage['RETRY_TIMES']}/" . $this->_nSendRetryTimes . ')...'
00121                     );
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 $aMessage['RETRY_TIMES']++;
00125 
00126                 $nLen = strlen($aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']);
00127                 if ($nLen !== ($nWritten = (int)@fwrite($this->_hSocket, $aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']))) {
00128                     $this->_log("ERROR: Unable to send message. Written {$nWritten} bytes instead of {$nLen} bytes");
00129                     continue;
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 $bSuccessfulSent = true;
00133 
00134                 $read = array($this->_hSocket);
00135                 $null = NULL;
00136                 $nChangedStreams = @stream_select($read, $null, $null, 0, $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout);
00137                 if ($nChangedStreams === false) {
00138                     $this->_log('WARNING: Unable to wait for a stream availability.');
00139                 } else if ($nChangedStreams > 0) {
00140                     if (feof($this->_hSocket)) {
00141                         $bSuccessfulSent = false;
00142                         $this->_log('ERROR: Unable to send message ' . ($k+1) . ', stream could be no more connected.');
00143                         $this->disconnect();
00144                         $this->connect();
00145                     }
00146                 }
00147             }
00148 
00149             if ($bSuccessfulSent) {
00150                 $this->_log('INFO: Message ' . ($k+1) . ' sent.');
00151                 unset($this->_aMessageQueue[$k]);
00152             }
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     /**
00157      * Returns all messages in the message queue.
00158      *
00159      * When a message is successful sent is removed from the message queue.
00160      * Getting the message queue after a send operation is useful to know which
00161      * messages are not delivered to the end user.
00162      *
00163      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message queue.
00164      * @return @type array Array of messages left on the queue.
00165      */
00166     public function getQueue($bEmpty = true)
00167     {
00168         $aRet = $this->_aMessageQueue;
00169         if ($bEmpty) {
00170             $this->_aMessageQueue = array();
00171         }
00172         return $aRet;
00173     }
00174 
00175     /**
00176      * Generate a binary notification from a device token and a JSON-encoded payload.
00177      *
00178      * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationBinary
00179      *
00180      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string The device token.
00181      * @param  $sPayload @type string The JSON-encoded payload.
00182      * @return @type string A binary notification.
00183      */
00184     protected function _getBinaryNotification($sDeviceToken, $sPayload)
00185     {
00186         $nTokenLength = strlen($sDeviceToken);
00187         $nPayloadLength = strlen($sPayload);
00188 
00189         $sRet  = pack('CnH*', self::COMMAND_PUSH, self::DEVICE_BINARY_SIZE, $sDeviceToken);
00190         $sRet .= pack('n', $nPayloadLength);
00191         $sRet .= $sPayload;
00192 
00193         return $sRet;
00194     }
00195 }
